overview:
Zachary Chastain is one of the most tenured contributing members of AVG’s online community. He regularly contributes answers to community member’s questions, technical support, assists in handling customer service inquiries, and has been an instrumental part of the AVG Facebook Community for over a year. He currently works very closely with AVG, attending weekly conference calls and has made many high level contacts at AVG Technologies.

Zachary has earned 4 AVG Community Awards, was the first member of the AVG Community to be awarded with VIP status, and recently was brought to Prague, Czech Republic by AVG, where he met with senior executives and enjoyed a concert hosted by AVG Technologies, featuring Czech funk band Monkey Business. Despite his vast knowledge and dedication to assisting the AVG Community, he is not an employee of AVG, and all of the work he has contributed with AVG and the AVG Community is voluntary.
